page.title: 12Medical Care Around Chard
page.content: There is a Doctor's Practice in{BLOCK {12}where three male partners provide medical cover for an area of over{100 {sq.km.}around the Chard district. Health Visitors specialise in nursing and pre_school child care and well baby clinics are held weekly at the surgery. Patients requiring specialist attention are usually referred to consultants in {Taunton}and from there,possibly to{Bristol.} The Chard Clinic is quite distinct from the Surgery and is provided by {Somerset Health Authority}primarily to house the{School Dental Service.}A dentist shares his time between clinics in Chard and Crewkerne and is responsible for children from}3 to the end of full_time education who choose not to have free treatment from a private dental surgeon.
